bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2000.

bibl.note: 1. Further observations in the Baptistery. - [2.] Building remains around the East-Church. - [3.] The granary to the west of the Eastern Church. - [4.] Sondages to the west of the Pilgrimage Court.
